visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with zooming and panning capabilities. The chart should have a title 'Zooming and panning', a subtitle explaining how to use these features, and an x-axis with month categories. The data series should represent monthly data points. The chart should have a white background and a legend positioned at the bottom.

subtitle.text: Click and drag to zoom in. Hold down shift key to pan in both directions.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a line chart with interactive features such as zooming and panning. The chart has a white background and includes a title and subtitle styled with specific font sizes and colors. The x-axis is labeled with month categories, and the y-axis has a title and labels styled similarly. The data series, named 'Monthly Data', is represented by a specific color. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered and styled with a consistent font size and color. This setup ensures a clear and interactive visualization of the monthly data points.
